attachments.title: The end of the Swedish model - Marginal REVOLUTION
attachments.text: The government this week proposed an emergency law that would allow it to lock down large parts of society; the first recommended use of face masks came into force; and the authorities gave schools the option to close for pupils older than 13 — all changes to its strategy to combat the pandemic. “I don’t …
attachments.fallback: Marginal REVOLUTION: The end of the Swedish model - Marginal REVOLUTION

text:
> Sweden’s distinctive Covid strategy nears an end as lockdown proposed
What? The law explicitly mentions that it is not allowed to be used to inhibit e.g. freedom of movement.

For people who want to read the actual recommendations (google translate should work well) and not a summary of a paywalled article on a blog post, see:

- <https://www.folkhalsomyndigheten.se/nyheter-och-press/nyhetsarkiv/2021/januari/butiker-gym-och-kopcentrum-maste-begransa-antalet-besokare/>

- <https://www.folkhalsomyndigheten.se/nyheter-och-press/nyhetsarkiv/2021/januari/undvik-smittspridning-i-hogstadieskolorna/>
